info.title: Kaprien Rest API
info.description: Kaprien Rest API service for Kaprien Server

get.summary: Check the bootstrap status. Scope: read:bootstrap
get.description: Check if the boostrap of the system is done or not.

post.summary: Bootstrap the system with initial signed Metadata. Scope: write:bootstrap
post.description: Initialize the Kaprien with initial signed Metadata and Settings.

post.summary: Add targets files to Metadata. Scope: write:targets

get.description: Return the token details. It requires an authenticated token with scope authorization.

post.description: Issue a token with scopes for all granted user scope.

post.summary: Issue token from authenticated token. Scope: write:token
post.description: Issue token from a valid and existent token.

get.description: Get Repository Metadata task status. The status is according with Celery tasks: `PENDING` the task still not processed or unknown/inexistent task. `RECEIVED` task is reveived by the broker server. `PRE_RUN` the task will start by kaprien-repo-worker. `RUNNING` the task is in execution. `FAILURE` the task failed to executed. `SUCCESS` the task execution is finished.

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Add scopes separeted by space. Default user scopes. Users might not have all scopes. Available scopes: read:bootstrap read:settings read:targets read:tasks read:token write:bootstrap write:targets write:token
